Daaku Maharaaj director Bobby expresses gratitude in a heartfelt note - 123telugu
summary:
Director Bobby Expresses Heartfelt Gratitude For Daaku Maharaaj

Published on Jan 12, 2025 7:24 am IST

Director Bobby Kolli's film, Daaku Maharaaj, featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna, releases today. He took to social media to share a heartfelt note reflecting on the film's journey and expressing gratitude to his team.

  • Bobby expresses excitement for audiences to experience the film after two years of production.
  • The film tells the story of a noble man fighting for others, transcending the typical action entertainer genre.
  • Bobby thanks fans and acknowledges the contributions of the entire team, including cast members and crew.
  • The film features a notable cast including Bobby Deol as the antagonist and music composed by Thaman.
  • Bobby ends his note with the slogan, “Jai Balayya!” inviting everyone to enjoy the film this Sankranthi.
Dear audience,
Today is an incredibly special day for me and the entire team of #DaakuMaharaaj.
It marks the culmination of 2 years of passion and hard work.

In conclusion, Bobby's heartfelt message showcases the dedication behind Daaku Maharaaj and invites fans to celebrate its release.
newTitle: Director Bobby Expresses Heartfelt Gratitude For Daaku Maharaaj

Weekly horoscope from January 12 to January 18: Your luck for this week; see which signs have lady luck smiling for them - India Today
summary:
Weekly Horoscope from January 12 to January 18: Your Luck for This Week

Published On: Jan 12, 2025 | Published By: Ayush Bisht

This weekly horoscope reveals the luck and predictions for each zodiac sign from January 12 to January 18, providing insights into personal and professional aspects of life.

  • Aries: On a roll with solutions and potential recognition; students to excel.
  • Taurus: A crisis averted; focus on the present to move forward.
  • Gemini: Strengthen community connections; mental health improves.
  • Cancer: Assertive leadership; family harmony; trust your judgment on investments.
  • Leo: Time to slow down and appreciate life; recoveries in health.
  • Virgo: Work feels tedious; focus on peace at home.
  • Libra: Be aware of indirect actions from others; love life gets busier.
  • Scorpio: Calm approach helps in managing stress and family matters.
  • Sagittarius: Nostalgia returns with a focus on lessons learned.
  • Capricorn: Transition brings new routines; adaptability is key.
  • Aquarius: Productivity spikes with multiple projects; watch for manipulative individuals.
  • Pisces: A quiet period for rest and reflection; consider spiritual practices.
newTitle: Weekly Horoscope from January 12 to January 18: Which Signs Are in Luck?

title: Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari - 123telugu
summary:
Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari

Published on Jan 12, 2025

Thalapathy Vijay is currently working on his last film, Thalapathy69, which will be his focus before shifting entirely to politics. The film is directed by H. Vinoth and is in production, with confirmatory remarks about its basis being a remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • Thalapathy Vijay has shown a keen interest in Bhagavanth Kesari, watching it five times.
  • VTV Ganesh confirmed the remake at a promotional event, detailing Vijay's involvement and his initial reluctance from other directors to adapt the film.
“Vijay sir liked Bhagavanth Kesari pretty much. He watched the film for five times.” - VTV Ganesh

This news heightens anticipation among fans of both Vijay and the original film.
newTitle: Thalapathy69 Confirmed as Remake of Bhagavanth Kesari

T'gana govt withdraws orders allowing ticket price hike for Ram Charan starrer 'Game Changer' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Telangana government announced the withdrawal of orders that allowed a hike in ticket prices for the film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan. This decision follows directives from the High Court regarding public interest, health, and safety.

  • The government had initially allowed an increase in ticket prices by ₹150 for multiplex and ₹100 for single theatres for shows on January 10.
  • From January 11 to 19, an additional ₹100 and ₹50 was permitted for multiplex and single theatres, respectively.
  • Early morning shows are now prohibited until further notice.
“The government had initially allowed ticket price hikes despite previous criticisms regarding public safety.”

This decision emphasizes the government's commitment to public safety following incidents in recent screenings.
newTitle: Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

title: Vanangaan Day 1 Tamil Nadu Box Office: Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash action-drama grosses Rs 1 crore on opening day - PINKVILLA
summary:
Vanangaan Day 1 Tamil Nadu Box Office: Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash action-drama grosses Rs 1 crore on opening day

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Vanangaan, featuring Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash, opened on January 10, 2025, with a gross of Rs 1 crore in Tamil Nadu on its first day.

  • The film was directed by Bala.
  • It competes against other releases like Madraskaaran, Game Changer, and Fateh.
  • Arun Vijay replaced Suriya in the lead role due to storyline changes.
  • The film is expected to grow its business during the Pongal weekend.
“The much-hyped film can flourish in Tamil Nadu, provided it receives strong word-of-mouth from the audience.”

In conclusion, Vanangaan has had a promising start at the box office, and its performance is anticipated to improve with positive audience feedback.
newTitle: Vanangaan Day 1 Tamil Nadu Box Office: Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash action-drama grosses Rs 1 crore on opening day

title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday! - Koimoi
summary:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan’s latest film, Game Changer, continues to perform well at the box office, with promising early estimates for its second day.

  • Day 1 earnings were strong at 54 crores net across all languages in India.
  • The Hindi version opened particularly well, earning 8.64 crores.
  • On Day 2, it is estimated to earn between 7-7.50 crores.
  • This reflects a drop of 18-13% from its opening day but maintains a strong total.
  • Game Changer competes with Jr NTR’s Devara, which collected 17.45 crores over two days.
“Despite a regular working Friday, Shankar’s directorial made a stunning opening.”

The film is attracting decent reviews and positive word-of-mouth, promising continued interest.
newTitle: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday!

title: Mandy Moore hits back at critics who slammed her for family's LA fire relief fundraiser: ‘Kindly F off’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actress Mandy Moore has responded to criticism regarding her family's fire relief fundraiser on social media. Moore shared a GoFundMe link to help her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, Griff and Kit, after they lost their home to the Eaton Fire, highlighting the immediate need for support as they prepare for their first child.

  • Moore's family was affected by the Eaton Fire, which devastated their home.
  • She emphasized their urgent need for help with a baby on the way.
  • Moore faced backlash for promoting the fundraiser, to which she responded strongly.
  • She pointed out that the couple's situation is dire, as Griff, a musician, lost his tools of trade.
  • Moore urged her followers to contribute and show empathy rather than criticism.
“Kindly F OFF. no one is forcing you to do anything.”

In conclusion, Mandy Moore expresses the importance of community support and emotional resilience during such challenging times.
newTitle: Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

title: Box Office: Re-Release Run Helps 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani' To Top 200 Crore Net Collection - Sacnilk
Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3 - Sacnilk
summary:
Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Sacnilk

Rekhachithram performed well at the box office, earning an estimated ₹4.10 Cr in its first two days. On the third day, the film earned around ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates).

Key Points

  • Day 1 collection: ₹1.9 Cr
  • Day 2 collection: ₹2.2 Cr (15.79% increase)
  • Day 3 collection: ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates)
  • Total collection after 3 days: ₹7.35 Cr
  • Overall Malayalam occupancy: 61.32%

Day 3 Malayalam (2D) Occupancy

  • Morning Shows: 38.84%
  • Afternoon Shows: 56.70%
  • Evening Shows: 69.52%
  • Night Shows: 80.21%
"Rekhachithram had an overall 61.32% Malayalam Occupancy on Saturday."

About This Movie: Directed by Jofin T. Chacko and produced by Kavya Film Company and Ann Mega Media, the film stars Asif Ali, Anaswara Rajan, Manoj K. Jayan, and Siddique.

Disclaimer: The Box Office Data are compiled from various sources and are approximate.

title: Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Shalini Passi shares her journey of overcoming physical limitations after giving birth at a young age, defying medical advice to regain her mobility.

  • Shalini Passi lost sensation in her spine and legs after childbirth.
  • She was advised by her doctor to receive spine injections and refrain from dancing.
  • Determined to regain her abilities, she pursued alternate therapies including Yoga and muscle training.
  • Her doctor expressed surprise at her recovery, calling it a miracle.
“My doctor said, ‘You will have to get an injection in your spine for the rest of your life’…”

Shalini’s story highlights her determination and the importance of alternative therapies in recovery, fostering a close bond with her son throughout their journey.
newTitle: Shalini Passi Overcomes Loss of Sensation After Childbirth

title: Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Indian Express

The fourth season of Shark Tank India has begun with notable pitches, including a memorable one from cousins Preeti and Sayali for their jaggery brand, Gudworld. They sought Rs 50 lakh for a 2% equity stake in their company.

  • Preeti’s effective communication impressed all the sharks.
  • Vineeta Singh and Aman Gupta had differing opinions on the business strategy.
  • Aman ultimately offered Rs 50 lakh for a 6% equity stake.
  • Preeti negotiated and accepted a counteroffer of 5% equity.
  • Anupam Mittal referred to Preeti as 'laadli' after their discussion.
“You are the king of e-commerce, and we would really value your mentorship.” – Preeti

The pitch showcased the potential and resources available to the entrepreneurs, leading to a successful investment deal.
newTitle: Shark Tank India 4: Cousins Impress Sharks with Jaggery Pitch
